程序包 jse.lmp

类 NativeLmp

java.lang.Object
jse.lmp.NativeLmp
所有已实现的接口:
AutoCloseable, IAutoShutdown, IShutdownable
public class NativeLmp extends Object implements IAutoShutdown
基于 jni 的调用本地原生 lammps 的类， 使用类似 python 调用 lammps 的结构， 使用 MPI 实现并行。

由于 lammps 的特性，此类线程不安全，并且要求所有方法都由相同的线程调用

References: The lammps Python module , LAMMPS Library Interfaces ,

作者:
liqa

    static final class 
    NativeLmp.InitHelper
    用于判断是否进行了静态初始化以及方便的手动初始化

  • 构造器详细资料

    • NativeLmp

      public NativeLmp(String[] aArgs, @Nullable MPI.Comm aComm) throws LmpException
      Create an instance of the LAMMPS Java class.

      This is a Java wrapper class that exposes the LAMMPS C-library interface to Java. It either requires that LAMMPS has been compiled as shared library which is then dynamically loaded via the jni, for example through the java <init> method. When the class is instantiated it calls the lammps_open() function of the LAMMPS C-library interface, which in turn will create an instance of the LAMMPS C++ class. The handle to this C++ class is stored internally and automatically passed to the calls to the C library interface.

      参数:
      aArgs - array of command line arguments to be passed to the lammps_open() (or lammps_open_no_mpi() when no mpi or no init mpi) function. The executable name is automatically added.
      aComm - MPI communicator as provided by MPI (or MPI.Native). null means use MPI.Comm.WORLD implicitly.
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • NativeLmp

      public NativeLmp(Collection<? extends CharSequence> aArgs, @Nullable MPI.Comm aComm) throws LmpException
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • version

      public int version() throws LmpException
      Return a numerical representation of the LAMMPS version in use.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_version() function of the C-library interface.

      返回:
      version number
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • comm

      public MPI.Comm comm() throws LmpException
      Get the MPI communicator in use by the current LAMMPS instance

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_file() function of the C-library interface. It will return null if the LAMMPS library was compiled without MPI support.

      返回:
      the MPI.Comm of this NativeLmp
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • shutdownMPI

      public static void shutdownMPI() throws LmpException
      Shut down the MPI communication like MPI.shutdown()

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_mpi_finalize() function of the C-library interface.

      抛出:
      LmpException

    • file

      public void file(String aPath) throws LmpException
      Read LAMMPS commands from a file.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_file() function of the C-library interface. It will open the file with the name/path file and process the LAMMPS commands line by line until the end. The function will return when the end of the file is reached.

      参数:
      aPath - Name of the file/path with LAMMPS commands
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • file

      public void file(IInFile aLmpIn) throws IOException, LmpException
      提供一个更加易用的直接使用 IInFile 作为输入的 file 方法，底层会使用 commands(java.lang.String...) 来执行多行命令
      参数:
      aLmpIn - 需要读取的 lammps in 文件
      抛出:
      IOException
      LmpException

    • command

      public void command(String aCmd) throws LmpException
      Process a single LAMMPS input command from a string.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_command() function of the C-library interface.

      参数:
      aCmd - a single lammps command
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • commands

      public void commands(String... aCmds) throws LmpException
      Process multiple LAMMPS input commands from a list of strings.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_commands_list() function of the C-library interface.

      参数:
      aCmds - a list of lammps commands
      抛出:
      LmpException

      public void commands(String aMultiCmd) throws LmpException

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_commands_string() function of the C-library interface.

      参数:
      aMultiCmd - text block of lammps commands
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • box

      public LmpBox box() throws LmpException
      Extract simulation box parameters

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_extract_box() function of the C-library interface. Unlike in the C function, the result is returned a LmpBox object.

      返回:
      a LmpBox object.
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • resetBox

      public void resetBox(double aXlo, double aXhi, double aYlo, double aYhi, double aZlo, double aZhi, double aXY, double aXZ, double aYZ) throws LmpException
      Reset simulation box parameters

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_reset_box() function of the C-library interface, but in LmpBoxPrism order.

      抛出:
      LmpException

    • settingOf

      public int settingOf(String aName) throws LmpException
      Query LAMMPS about global settings that can be expressed as an integer.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_extract_setting() function of the C-library interface. Its documentation includes a list of the supported keywords.

      参数:
      aName - name of the setting
      返回:
      value of the setting
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • atomDataOf

      public RowMatrix atomDataOf(String aName) throws LmpException, MPIException
      Gather the named per-atom, per-atom fix, per-atom compute, or fix property/atom-based entities from all processes, unordered.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_gather_concat() function of the C-library interface. Its documentation includes a list of the supported keywords and their data types. This function will try to auto-detect the data type by asking the library. This function returns null if either the keyword is not recognized.

      参数:
      aName - name of the property
      返回:
      RowMatrix of requested data
      抛出:
      LmpException
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • lammps_gather_concat()

    • atomIntDataOf

      public RowIntMatrix atomIntDataOf(String aName) throws LmpException, MPIException
      抛出:
      LmpException
      MPIException

    • fullAtomDataOf

      public RowMatrix fullAtomDataOf(String aName, boolean aIsDouble, int aColNum) throws LmpException, MPIException
      Gather the named per-atom, per-atom fix, per-atom compute, or fix property/atom-based entities from all processes, unordered.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_extract_atom() function of the C-library interface.

      参数:
      aName - name of the property
      aIsDouble - false for int, true for double
      aColNum - column number of Matrix of requested data
      返回:
      RowMatrix of requested data, row number is always atomNum.
      抛出:
      LmpException
      MPIException

    • fullAtomIntDataOf

      public RowIntMatrix fullAtomIntDataOf(String aName, int aColNum) throws LmpException, MPIException
      抛出:
      LmpException
      MPIException

    • localAtomDataOf

      public RowMatrix localAtomDataOf(String aName, int aDataType, int aRowNum, int aColNum) throws LmpException
      获取此进程的原子数据而不进行收集操作， 似乎 mass 需要使用此方法才能合法获取； 这里支持 BigBig 包因此需要 int 类型的 aDataType

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_extract_atom() function of the C-library interface.

      参数:
      aName - name of the property
      aDataType - 0 for int, 1 for double, 2 for int64_t when LAMMPS_BIGBIG is defined, 3 for int64_t anyway
      aColNum - column number of Matrix of requested data
      aRowNum - row number of Matrix of requested data
      返回:
      RowMatrix of requested data
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • localAtomIntDataOf

      public RowIntMatrix localAtomIntDataOf(String aName, int aDataType, int aRowNum, int aColNum) throws LmpException
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • localAtomCPointerDataOf

      public CPointer localAtomCPointerDataOf(String aName) throws LmpException
      直接获取原子数据的 C 指针，用于只获取部分数据而不是整体， 可以避免整体值拷贝带来的损耗。
      参数:
      aName - name of the property
      返回:
      CPointer of lammps internal atom data
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • setAtomDataOf

      public void setAtomDataOf(String aName, IMatrix aData) throws LmpException
      Scatter the named per-atom, per-atom fix, per-atom compute, or fix property/atom-based entity in data to all processes.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_scatter() function of the C-library interface. This subroutine takes data stored in a one-dimensional array supplied by the user and scatters them to all atoms on all processes. The data must be ordered by atom ID, with the requirement that the IDs be consecutive. Use lammps_scatter_subset() to scatter data for some (or all) atoms, unordered.

      参数:
      aName - name of the property
      aData - Matrix of data to set
      抛出:
      LmpException
      另请参阅:
      • lammps_scatter()

    • setAtomDataOf

      public void setAtomDataOf(String aName, IMatrix aData, boolean aIsDouble) throws LmpException
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • lmpdat

      public Lmpdat lmpdat(boolean aNoVelocities) throws LmpException, MPIException
      通过 atomDataOf(java.lang.String) 直接构造一个 Lmpdat， 可以避免走文件管理系统
      参数:
      aNoVelocities - 是否关闭速度信息，默认 false（包含速度信息）
      返回:
      一个类似于读取 lammps data 文件后得到的 Lmpdat
      抛出:
      LmpException
      MPIException

    • loadLmpdat

      public void loadLmpdat(Lmpdat aLmpdat) throws LmpException
      更加易用的方法，类似于 lammps 的 read_data 命令，但是不需要走文件管理器； 实际实现过程有些区别
      参数:
      aLmpdat - 作为输入的原子数据
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • creatAtoms

      public void creatAtoms(List<? extends IAtom> aAtoms, boolean aShrinkExceed) throws LmpException
      Create N atoms from list of coordinates and properties

      This function is a wrapper around the lammps_create_atoms() function of the C-library interface.

      参数:
      aAtoms - List of Atoms
      aShrinkExceed - whether to expand shrink-wrap boundaries if atoms are outside the box (false in default)
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • creatAtoms

      public void creatAtoms(List<? extends IAtom> aAtoms) throws LmpException
      抛出:
      LmpException

      public void clear() throws LmpException
      lammps clear 指令
      抛出:
      LmpException

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Explicitly delete a LAMMPS instance through the C-library interface.

      This is a wrapper around the lammps_close() function of the C-library interface.

      指定者:
      shutdown 在接口中 IAutoShutdown
      指定者:
      shutdown 在接口中 IShutdownable
